references: S. Janson, On the traveling fly problem, Graph Theory Notes of New York, Vol. XXXI, 17, 1996.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..300
S. Janson, On the traveling fly problem
formula: a(n) = denominator of x(n) with x(n)=x(n-2)+1/x(n-1), x(0)=x(1)=1. [_Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 08 2011]
prog: (Haskell)import Data.Ratio ((%), denominator)a004730 n = a004730_list !! na004730_list = map denominator ggs where   ggs = 1 : 2 : zipWith (+) ggs (map (1 /) $ tail ggs) :: [Rational]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 08 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
